text: New Town Hall by night The New Town Hall () is the administrative centre of Prague's (medieval) New Town Quarter, or "Nové Město". In 1419 it was the site of the first of the three defenestrations of Prague. ==External links== * New Town Hall on Prague-wiki Category:Buildings and structures in Prague Category:City and town halls in the Czech Republic Category:Tourist attractions in Prague Category:National Cultural Monuments of the Czech Republic
title: New Town Hall (Prague)
